response.homeDescription: Welcome home to the duplex at 1137 Broadway Avenue; located in highly desirable Alamitos Beach, loaded with significant pride of ownership, and bursting exterior impact. Enjoy the lush tropical landscaping while you enjoy your morning coffee on the secluded front patio. While the original tax roll states that each unit offers two bedrooms and one bathroom, each unit currently showcases two bedrooms and two bathrooms. The lower unit contains a massive living room that is open to the formal dining room and remodeled kitchen with tiled flooring, granite counters, bright white cabinetry, and a gleaming stainless steel appliance suite. The spacious bedrooms are light filled and possess carpeting and hardwood flooring. The downstairs bathrooms have been updated and include a pedestal sink, bead board wainscoting, and a large jetted tub. Not to be out shown by the lower unit, the upper unit has a similar floor plan and its own roof top deck! A necessity for Long Beach, this building has a loooong driveway with room for multiple off-street parking spaces. Enjoy the many perks of this location; this duplex is close to the Bluff, the Ocean, and the vibrant East Village Arts District. For more information, please call us at 800.784.2616 EXT 201.
